amendment.description: Amendment acknowledges Dr. Afridi's instrumental role in identifying the hiding place of Osama bin Laden and further states that it is the Sense of Congress that Dr. Shakil Afridi is an international hero and that the Government of Pakistan should release him immediately from prison.
amendment.purpose: An amendment No. 23 printed in House Report 114-112 to acknowledge Dr. Afridi's instrumental role in identifying the hiding place of Osama bin Laden and to further state that it is the Sense of Congress that Dr. Shakil Afridi is an international hero and that the Government of Pakistan should release him immediately from prison.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Rohrabacher amendment (A010) Agreed to by recorded vote: 413 - 1, 2 Present (Roll no. 233).

action.text: Roll call votes on amendments in House
House amendment agreed to: On agreeing to the Rohrabacher amendment (A010) Agreed to by recorded vote: 413 - 1, 2 Present (Roll no. 233).
Amendment agreed to Committee of the Whole
House amendment offered/reported by : Amendment (A010) offered by Mr. Rohrabacher.
